modName: UNP meshes for the Lore Friendly Armor pack
summary: Adapts the Lore Friendly Armor pack to the UNP female body
descriptionHtml:
Either Rahman\'s original mod or the Immersive Armor Pack is REQUIRED!
Download Lore Friendly Armor Pack here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6684
OR
Download the Immersive Armor Pack here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733



Install, then uncompress these meshes and drop them into your default Skyrim directory and allow these meshes to overwrite. Your female  Lore Friendly armor will now have the UNP body shape. The male body will be unaffected. Will not replace any othe armors or your default female body.

_____________________
THERE WILL BE CLIPPING!
I\'ve done my best to minimize it, but the original mod was made by overlaying multiple meshes and using transparency to add only the desired pieces. I\'ve substituted UNP meshes and contoured them as best I can so them work together, but there will be times when one mesh will clip over another one.  Hopefully it won\'t be a game breaker for you, but if it is, just uninstall and move on... life is full of little disappointments. If you want to take a shot at fixing it yourself, have at it.  
______________________


Adapted with permission from Rahman530, kudos to his orginal work.
author: Exeter

files.name: Shadow fix for the barbarian armor
